forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 13C. E winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 56F. E winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 21C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 71F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
